value.title: Scan open source components for vulnerabilities and license ratings in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Scan open-source components for security vulnerabilities and assess their license ratings when your application builds in Azure Pipelines.

value.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints
value.excerpt: Find out how Azure network security groups and service endpoints help you secure your virtual machines and Azure services from unauthorized network access.

value.title: Create and publish a static web app with Gatsby and Azure Static Web Apps
value.excerpt: Use Gatsby to develop and compile a static web app, then deploy it to the web with Azure Static Web Apps.

value.title: Troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer
value.excerpt: Learn how to troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer.

value.title: Track global air quality with Azure Maps
value.excerpt: This module shows how you can track global air quality using the Azure Maps Web SDK and pollution data from a third-party air quality API.

value.title: Use containers for your Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) Apps
value.excerpt: The Language Understanding (LUIS) container loads your trained or published Language Understanding model. As a LUIS app, the docker container provides access to the query predictions from the container's API endpoints
